title: Property deeds and title documents
personalDataVerified: Grantor name, grantee name, property legal description, recording date, recording number, county/jurisdiction
personalDataVisible: Lien status (if liens recorded). Superseded date (if deed superseded by later conveyance). Link to county recorder system (public access for basic info, authenticated access for full chain of title)
rationale: Prevents property fraud and forged deeds. Chain of title verification for real estate transactions. Permanent legal records maintained by county recorders. Human-readable legal descriptions critical for property boundaries. Domain binding to county recorder offices ensures authenticity.
